Phrase.Text:
We see you've gathered an alliance of the weak to battle the greatest evil ever known.
Good luck with your war, [YourLeaderName].

Greetings, friend. Let us rise up against this evil and prove our unified might.
For the fate of the galaxy, go forth with honor and courage.
And so it begins. We shall battle these Dread Lords and deal with the wretched Drengin and their unholy robotic ally soon enough.

We have lived under the shadow of oppression before. It will not happen again.
Our forces will join yours to triumph over the Dread Lords.
Still holding onto hope, fleshling? Your future is bleak, [YourLeaderName]... and your death is inevitable.
It is time for us to finish the war of the Arnor. Together, we will bring down the Dread Lord army and put an end to this darkness.
Honor and courage can only get you so far. The power of the Dread Lords consumes my forces, [YourLeaderName]. Is there anything you can do to help?
The tide of war washes over our forces, cousin. If you can spare the troops, we desperately need your help.
The strength of the Dark Arnor has grown and our forces crumble beneath their might. Can you do anything to help, [YourLeaderName]?
Why would you attack my forces, [YourLeaderName]? The Dread Lords are the true enemies!
Brother, you come seeking war when war already surrounds us? Let us put these grievances behinds us and refocus on the true enemy!
